Consumerism

January 2010

Is a way of giving people the illusion of control. It is not the people in charge, it is their desires in charge and all their desires are filled by products.

This is the so called free market, where it is free to satisfy any needs until they are profitable.

This story is about capitalism. With focus on simulacra, control, desire.
